content: to 6 row 13 k2 p1 k6 6/6 rc p1 k2 row 14 to 18 repeat row 2 to 6 repeat row 7 to 18 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 more times bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn your shoulder saddle should measure 15 15 15 15 15 15 19 19 19 cm lengthwise after washing and blocking repeat pattern for another shoulder saddle each shoulder saddle s cast on edge should be orientated at the neck and the cast off edge should be orientated at the armhole front left shoulder the front shoulders are worked back and forth in stockinette with german shortrow shaping for the shoulders followed by increases for the neckline ds are resolved by working the two legs of the ds with k2tog or p2tog with 4 5 mm needles from the rs pick up and knit 29 29 29 29 29 29 37 37 37 sts along the length of one shoulder saddle from the cast on corner to the cast off corner the pick up rate is about 2 sts for every 3 row row 1 ws p to end turn row 2 rs k5 turn row 3 make a ds p to end turn wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com row 4 k to previous ds resolve ds k5 turn row 5 make a ds p to end turn repeat the last two row 3 3 3 3 3 3 5 5 5 more times next row k to previous ds resolve ds k to end turn next row p to end turn you will begin shaping the neckline and armholes at the same time size 1 only row 1 rs k1 m1l k to end turn row 2 ws p to end turn row 3 to 4 repeat row 1 and 2 row 5 k1 m1l k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn row 6 p to end turn row 7 to 12 repeat row 1 to 6 you should have 33 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder size 2 only row 1 rs k1 m1l k to end turn row 2 ws p to end turn row 3 to 10 repeat row 1 and 2 four times row 11 k1 m1l k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn row 12 p to end turn you should have 34 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder all other sizes row 1 rs k1 m1l k to end turn row 2 ws p to end turn row 3 to 12 repeat row 1 and 2 five times you should have -
